function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of coronavirus influencing travel decisions","Impact":"Limited travel options and reduced tourism activity","Mitigation":"Provide clear and up-to-date information on COVID-19 measures and safety protocols for travel destinations","Technologies":"Use of travel apps and websites to provide real-time COVID-19 updates and travel advisories","People":"Serbian travelers and tourism industry","Owner":"Travel agencies, government tourism departments"},{"Description":"Anxiety related to COVID-19 situation","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being of the population","Mitigation":"Offer mental health support services and resources, promote outdoor activities for stress relief","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote mental health counseling, virtual mental wellness programs","People":"Serbian population","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliability of research instrument and data analysis","Impact":"Inaccurate results and unreliable findings","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough reliability and validity tests, ensure cultural adaptation of research instruments","Technologies":"Statistical software for factor analysis and regression analysis, cultural sensitivity training for researchers","People":"Researchers and data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, universities"}]}
